content: 4 round 4 chain 6 counts as 1st double_crochet & chain 3 skip 3 sts & slip_stitch into next chsp chain 3 skip 3 sts & double_crochet into 4th st skip 3 sts chain 3 & slip_stitch into chsp x5 chain 3 & slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning chain 6 to join fo 6 sts 12 chsps round 5 with new color beginning in any chsp 3tr-ch2-3tr into chsp 4 double_crochet into the next 2 chsps x4 slip_stitch or invisible join into 1st st & fo 56 sts ©2023 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 5 round 6 with new color beginning in any chsp 3dc-ch2-3dc into chsp double_crochet next 2 sts working over the next st the space between clusters & the 1st st in the next cluster dc3tog x3 double_crochet next 2 sts x4 slip_stitch or invisible join to 1st st & fo 68 sts ©2023 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 6 round 7 with new color beginning in any chsp 2hdc-ch2-2hdc into chsp half_double_crochet next 17 sts x4 slip_stitch or invisible join to 1st st & fo 84 sts round 8 with new color beginning in any corner chsp 3 single_crochet into chsp single_crochet next 21 sts x4 fo & invisible join 96 sts alternate border if you want a more squared-off finish instead of rounded corners beginning in any chsp 2sc-ch2-2sc into chsp single_crochet into next 21 sts x4 join and fo 100 sts ©2023 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 7
